Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join, of a small pottery transport amphora or a lagynos. Clay near fine red brown; dull slip. Oval stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Pencil '75'. Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 121, 14?
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.125)
